title: Grand Canyon of the Stikine
whats_it_like: The most famous class 5 multiday in North America. Big volume paddling in a spectacular, committing canyon.
scouting_portaging: Scouting OK.  There are several large must run rapids.

time.original: Traditionally 3 days, can be done in 1 (or why not 2 laps in one day?).

when_to_go: August to September.  Snow pack and rain dependant.
